title: LF members for a NEW rank team/open ladder (plat + req)
body:
Hey guys

Im a plat 4 mid laner and I am forming a team to hopefully participate in the oce open ladder and
to see how far we can push as a team :)

We currently have
Myself:Mid Plat 4
Dylbo:Jungle Plat 5
All other lanes are currently available
although we are testing a top laner at the moment :)

If you are interested please drop your IGNs below and ill add you in game.

looking for 18+ members without restrictions on when they can play, and 
can still have fun while playing to win :) 

Hope to hear from some of you soon :D
Duckyy {{champion:34}}

replies.body: im hella good. add me. i can carry you from support or ADC.
Note we are located in QLD so preffed being able to play in our peek times
